trans-unit.id:
Information about Cloud variables
 
Currently, only numbers are supported
Chat rooms are not allowed, and will be removed
For more info, see the cloud data FAQ!
trans-unit.source:
Information about Cloud variables
 
Currently, only numbers are supported
Chat rooms are not allowed, and will be removed
For more info, see the cloud data FAQ!
trans-unit.target:
Informacije o varijablama oblaka
 
Trenutno su podržani jedino brojevi
Čavrljanje nije dozvoljeno i bit će uklonjeno
Za više informacija, vidi često postavljena pitanja i odgovore (FAQ) vezane uz podatke oblaka!

trans-unit.id: a copy of the project file on your computer.
trans-unit.source: a copy of the project file on your computer.

trans-unit.note: library je knjižnica, mjesto gdje se mogu odabrati pozadine, odnosno tek onda slijedi izbor. Komentar?

trans-unit.id: Because you have a new Scratch account, any changes to cloud data won't be saved yet. Keep participating on the site you'll be able to use cloud data soon!
trans-unit.source: Because you have a new Scratch account, any changes to cloud data won't be saved yet. Keep participating on the site you'll be able to use cloud data soon!
trans-unit.target: Budući da imate novi Scratch račun promjene koje napravite na podacima u oblaku neće biti sačuvane.Nastavite s radom na stranici i uskoro ćete imati mogućnost korištenja podataka u oblaku!

trans-unit.note: Mode je način? Ima li bolji izraz? Ili je ovaj uobičajen?
Emitiranje, odašiljati, prenijeti, prenositi. Hm. Ako se vaš prijevod inače koristi, onda jasno, ok. Samo nisam siguran

alt-trans.target: ne znam kontekst na koji se odnosi?!

trans-unit.id: Can’t find network connection or reach server.
trans-unit.source: Can’t find network connection or reach server.
trans-unit.target: Ne mogu pronaći internetsku vezu ili se spojiti na server.

trans-unit.note: library - knjižnica, samo mi je to nejasno.

trans-unit.id: Click to try again or to save
trans-unit.source: Click to try again or to save
trans-unit.target: Odaberi za ponovni pokušaj ili za spremanje

trans-unit.note: postoje različite činele - crash, ride itd.

trans-unit.id: Currently, only numbers can be stored in Cloud variables.
trans-unit.source: Currently, only numbers can be stored in Cloud variables.
trans-unit.target: Trenutno je u varijable oblaka moguće spremiti jedino brojeve.

trans-unit.note: ili Preuzmite ili Preuzimam - ovisi o kontekstu
ovo je duplikat, a umnoži je nešto drugo.
fade znači iščezavati, nestajati. Fade in je postupno pojavljivanje.
instrument..imamo li mi drugi naziv za to?
uvozim ili unosim ili nešto treće?

trans-unit.id: Not saved; network or server problem.
trans-unit.source: Not saved; network or server problem.
trans-unit.target: Nije spremljeno; problemi s mrežom ili poslužiteljem.

trans-unit.id: Not saved; project did not load.
trans-unit.source: Not saved; project did not load.

trans-unit.id: This project can detect who is using it, through the “username” block. To hide your identity, sign out before using the project.
trans-unit.source: This project can detect who is using it, through the “username” block. To hide your identity, sign out before using the project.
trans-unit.target: Korisnik projekta može se odrediti preko bloka "korisničko ime". Kako bi sakrili svoj identitet, odjavite se prije korištenja projekta.

trans-unit.id: This project uses Cloud data ‒ a feature that is available only to signed in users.
trans-unit.source: This project uses Cloud data ‒ a feature that is available only to signed in users.
trans-unit.target: Projekt koristi podatke s oblaka - mogućnost koja je dostupna jedino prijavljenim korisnicima.

trans-unit.id: Throw away all changes since opening this project?
trans-unit.source: Throw away all changes since opening this project?
trans-unit.target: Odbaci sve promjene nastale od otvaranja ovog projekta?

trans-unit.id: To delete a block definition, first remove all uses of the block.
trans-unit.source: To delete a block definition, first remove all uses of the block.
trans-unit.target: Kako bi obrisali blok, prvo otklonite sve korisnike koji ga koriste.

trans-unit.id: Which column do you want to import
trans-unit.source: Which column do you want to import

trans-unit.note: možda postoji konkretnije ime za instrument

trans-unit.id:
You cannot edit cloud data in someone else's project.
Any change that you make in the editor will be temporary and not persistent.
trans-unit.source:
You cannot edit cloud data in someone else's project.
Any change that you make in the editor will be temporary and not persistent.
trans-unit.target:
Ne možete uređivati podatke oblaka u tuđim projektima.
Svaka promjena u pregledniku je privremena i nije trajna.
